name: Quicksilver Enchant
active: Quicksilver: Removes all crowd control effects and grants 100% tenacity for 0.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
tips: Quicksilver EnchantDispels crowd controlQuicksilver (Active): Removes all crowd control effects currently affecting you, and become immune to crowd control effects for 0.75 seconds.Perseverance (Passive): After the Quicksilver effects ends, grant 30% Tenacity and 30% Slow Resist for 1.5 seconds.
(60s Cooldown)Cannot be used during knock up or knock back effects.

800


This enchant cleanses all crowd control effects, grants brief CC immunity, then boosts your tenacity and slow resist.
Perfect for champions who need to quickly purge control to stay in the fight.
